title: Create comprehensive sign-up page with profile information fields

requirements.summary: Create SignUpPage component and wire navigation from landing page Get Started button
acceptanceCriteria: SignUpPage component exists in frontend/src/pages/
Route is configured in App.tsx to navigate to sign-up page
Get Started button on LandingPage navigates to the sign-up route

file_operations.description: Create SignUpPage component with comprehensive form layout including all profile fields (age, handicap, gender, seeking preference, bio, location, home course, profile photo). Use shadcn/ui form components for consistency with existing design system. Apply golf-themed styling using the fairway green, sand tan, and grass green color palette from the Tailwind configuration.
Add route configuration for /sign-up path that renders SignUpPage component. Ensure the route is accessible before authentication (public route) so new users can access the sign-up form.
Update the Get Started button to navigate to the /sign-up route using React Router navigation. Ensure the button triggers navigation on click.

requirements.summary: Add age input field with numeric validation to sign-up form
acceptanceCriteria: Age field accepts numeric input only
Field is clearly labeled
Validation ensures reasonable age range (e.g., 18-100)

file_operations.description: Add age input field using shadcn/ui Input component with type='number'. Implement validation to ensure age is between 18 and 100. Display clear label 'Age' and validation error messages when input is invalid. Use form state management to track age value.

requirements.summary: Add handicap input field with golf handicap range validation to sign-up form
acceptanceCriteria: Handicap field accepts numeric input
Field validates golf handicap range (typically -10 to 54)
Field is clearly labeled with golf terminology

file_operations.description: Add handicap input field using shadcn/ui Input component with type='number'. Implement validation to ensure handicap is between -10 and 54 (standard golf handicap range). Display clear label 'Golf Handicap' with optional helper text explaining the range. Show validation errors when input is outside valid range.

requirements.summary: Add gender selection field with male, female, and couple options
acceptanceCriteria: Selection control (radio buttons or dropdown) includes male, female, and couple options
Only one option can be selected at a time
Field is required before form submission

file_operations.description: Add gender selection field using shadcn/ui RadioGroup component with three options: Male, Female, and Couple. Ensure only one option can be selected at a time. Display clear label 'I am' and mark the field as required. Store selected value matching the backend Gender enum.

requirements.summary: Add seeking preference field to indicate desired match type (male, female, or couple)
acceptanceCriteria: Selection control includes options: male, female, couple
User can select what type of match they are seeking
Field is clearly labeled to distinguish from gender field

file_operations.description: Add seeking preference field using shadcn/ui RadioGroup component with three options: Male, Female, and Couple. Display clear label 'Looking For' to distinguish from the gender field. Mark the field as required and store value matching the backend Gender enum (lookingFor field).

requirements.summary: Add bio textarea field for user to describe themselves, likes, dislikes, and ideal golf partner
acceptanceCriteria: Multi-line textarea allows extended text input
Field includes placeholder text or label guiding users to share likes, dislikes, and ideal match description
Character limit is reasonable (e.g., 500-1000 characters)

file_operations.description: Add bio field using shadcn/ui Textarea component with multi-line input support. Display label 'About Me & My Ideal Golf Partner' with placeholder text guiding users to share likes, dislikes, and ideal match preferences. Implement character limit validation (500-1000 characters) with character counter display. Store value in the bio field.

requirements.summary: Add location input section for capturing user's geographical coordinates
acceptanceCriteria: Location input field accepts address or coordinates
Field is clearly labeled
Input validates location format

file_operations.description: Add location section with two numeric input fields for latitude and longitude using shadcn/ui Input components. Display clear labels 'Latitude' and 'Longitude' with helper text. Implement validation to ensure valid coordinate ranges (latitude: -90 to 90, longitude: -180 to 180). Store values in the location.lat and location.long fields matching the backend Coordinates type.

requirements.summary: Add home course input field for user's primary golf course name
acceptanceCriteria: Home course field accepts text input for course name
Field is clearly labeled as home course
Field allows users to identify their regular golf course

file_operations.description: Add home course field using shadcn/ui Input component with type='text'. Display clear label 'Home Course' with optional helper text explaining users should enter their primary golf course name. Store value in the homeCourse field.

requirements.summary: Add profile photo upload option with image preview and validation
acceptanceCriteria: File input control allows image file selection
Supported formats include common image types (JPEG, PNG)
Preview of selected image is displayed before submission
File size validation prevents oversized uploads

file_operations.description: Add profile photo upload section using shadcn/ui Input component with type='file' and accept='image/jpeg,image/png'. Implement file selection handler that reads the file as Uint8Array and displays image preview. Add file size validation (e.g., max 5MB) and show error messages for invalid files. Use ExternalBlob.fromBytes() from the blob-storage component to handle the image data. Store the blob reference in the profilePhoto field. Display the placeholder image from frontend/public/assets/generated/avatar-placeholder.dim_128x128.png before upload. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Apply golf-themed styling to sign-up page using existing design system
acceptanceCriteria: Page uses golf-themed color palette from existing design system (fairway green, sand tan, grass green)
Layout and component styling matches existing page patterns
Visual elements evoke golf and outdoor sporting elegance
All form components use shadcn/ui components for consistency

file_operations.description: Apply golf-themed styling to the sign-up page using Tailwind classes referencing the custom color palette (fairway green, sand tan, grass green) defined in frontend/tailwind.config.js. Use consistent layout patterns matching existing pages like ProfileSetup.tsx. Add visual elements such as the logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/lime-greens-logo.dim_400x200.png and golf-themed icons. Ensure all form components use shadcn/ui for consistency with the existing design system.

requirements.summary: Wire sign-up form submission to backend with validation, error handling, and navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Form submission calls backend profile creation mutation
All required fields are validated before submission
Success state navigates user to main application
Error states display helpful messages to user
Loading states provide feedback during submission

file_operations.description: Implement form submission handler that collects all field values (age, handicap, gender, lookingFor, bio, location coordinates, homeCourse, profilePhoto), validates required fields, and calls the saveCallerUserProfile mutation from useQueries.ts. Use the authorization component to ensure the user is authenticated before submission. Implement loading state with disabled form fields during submission. On success, navigate to the /map route (main application). On error, display toast notification with error message. Handle validation errors and display field-specific error messages. Verify the authorization component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation hook properly handles the complete UserProfile type including all new fields (age, lookingFor, homeCourse, profilePhoto). Verify mutation invalidates the currentUserProfile query on success for cache consistency.
